description: Erection of 72 dwellings in 59 flats and 13 houses with associated garages/parking on part of site with approval for 68 dwellings.
decision_conditions: The garages hereby permitted shall only be used for the parking of private motor vehicles (and for purposes incidental to the domestic use of the related dwelling house) and for no other purpose of use.
site_number: Land at former Chadwell Heath Hospital
